oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ægyptus antiqua divisa in Nomos
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Duval, P. (Pierre) , 1619-1682
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: authore P. Duval Abbeviliense Regis Christianissimi geographo.
Covers also a portion of Libya.
Oriented with North to the right.

Includes a note in a decorative cartouche: "A Monsieur Monsieur Doviat Sgr. de Montreuille, Con.er du Roy, et Maistre Ordinaire en sa Chambre des Comptes Par son Très humble et obéisant Serviteur P. Duval Géographe de sa Maiesté".
In Latin with a note in French.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale [ca. 1:2,100,000].
Egypt
